name: Ssmdb
body:
### SSMDB
This project was created for a course project. It was created in a team of 2. We were required to execute SQL queries. Process them. We choose the Movie industry to work with. The project has been created in PHP.

### ScreenShots
![](http://i.imgur.com/iQjXZoR.png)
